content:
Email Notifications for Intraday Management
An email notification is sent to an agent when they’re assigned a shift, a shift’s job profile changes, or a shift segment on an assigned shift changes. Notifications are sent to the address in the Email field on an agent’s user profile.

Workforce Engagement is available in Lightning Experience and available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions

To receive email notifications from Intraday Management: Workforce Engagement Agent

Email notifications are turned on when Intraday Management is enabled in Setup. Agents are emailed when these changes occur:

* The agent is assigned to a published shift that ends in the future.
* The job profile associated with the agent’s assigned shift change.
* The shift segment type associated with the agent’s assigned shift segment change.
* The agent is assigned to a new shift segment, overriding a previous shift segment assignment.

You can also set up an approval process and flow to let agents accept or reject shift changes after they’ve been notified.
title: Email Notifications for Intraday Management Setup
